main.name: Gang
main.description: This is a space where I share my personal web projects. For learning purposes
main.bio: Currently working full-time with focus on system design and architecture. Always admires asthetically pleasing things, hence having a side interest in frontend development (react-based). Always looking for great frontend projects to embark on my free time. Aspires to build products that I can be proud of.
main.contactmessage: Drop me a text to share experience or just catch up over coffee.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
